archimate:WorkPackage.name: Connect Foundation Platform Development Project
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation:
Connect Platform Development Project
This is the umbrella project for Development work which needs to be done at Tietoevry Connect level.
Projects under this are something which is benefiting not only S&C but also other units in Tietoevry Connect.
Motivation to run these projects is coming from various stakeholders why it makes sense to run these as a separate exercise from the various development project required within Security and Compliancy unit.
Resources
Program Manager looking after the whole exercise Enterprise architect making sure our projects are delivering what we need
